Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Updated the supporting applications with new features. Enhanced the install file to automatically update old installations without losing local data.

English.Char_Desc_45: Premium productivity office suite for Windows
English.Char_Desc_80: Free professional productivity office suite for all Windows Systems.
English.Char_Desc_250: This free professional office suite contains all the necessary software applications to get anyone started immediately, from a student, home user, to an office worker on a budget. Perfect for widescreen monitors, starting with 1366 x 768 or more...
English.Char_Desc_450: This office suite contains all the necessary software applications to get anyone started immediately... from a hard working student, the casual home user, to even an office worker on a budget. Perfect for widescreen monitors, starting with 1366 x 768 or more resolution. Each application has a very easy to use menu structure and its listed features are limited to just 3-levels deep for quick access, unlike most new ribbon interfaces.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
This free professional office suite contains all the necessary software applications to get anyone started immediately... from a hard working student, the casual home user, to even an office worker on a budget. Perfect for widescreen monitors, starting with 1366x768 resolution.
Each application has a very easy to use menu structure and its listed features are limited to just 3-levels deep for quick access, unlike most new ribbon interfaces. Also included is a professional peer-to-peer video phone for LAN and internet communications.
SSuite WordGraph Editor:
WordGraph is a free and very useful alternative to Microsoft's Word, OpenOffice's Writer, or anything else out there claiming to be the latest and greatest. You don't even have a need for .NET or even JAVA to be installed.
The tabbed document interfaces also make it easier to find your opened documents with a single view. The thumbnail previews enhances the user-interaction further by displaying the whole document layout, whether you are creating pdf's, image documents, or simply displaying the print preview as you create your important document, thesis, letter, or birthday card.
SSuite Accel Spreadsheet:
This powerful spreadsheet has all the tools you need to calculate, analyse, summarise, and present your data in numerical reports or colourful graphics. A fully-integrated help system makes entering complex formulas a breeze. Pull in external data using ODBC, sort it, and produce subtotals and statistical analyses. SSuite Accel spreadsheet has ODBC connectivity to query any database on your PC through SQL.
Minimum Requirements:
- 1366 x 768 Display Size - Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 and Beyond - 32bit/64bit
-
